summary: 该接口用于删除RDS集群系列实例的Endpoint。

schema.description:
该参数用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。参数值由客户端生成，保证在不同请求间唯一。

该参数值由ASCII字符组成，最长不超过64个字符，不能包含非ASCII字符。

schema.title: EndpointId
schema.description: 实例的Endpoint ID。可调用DescribeDBInstanceEndpoints查询。

400.errorMessage: Specified DB instance conn type is not valid.
Current db type is not support specified endpoint type.
A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.

403.errorMessage: Current DB instance state does not support this operation.

404.errorMessage: Current DB instance lock mode does not support this operation.
Specified instance does not exist or not support.

title: 删除实例的Endpoint
